divs: Sighting DetailsI was a little later to get outside so I got a chance to see this object for a few minutes with the camera, I tried to take a picture of it but it would not show up on the camera for some reason. My father managed to get a video of it but he decided to keep it zoomed in the entire time so to me it looks a little blocky. Any who this looks like the same white object I saw on June 1st with my Mother, Brother and father but this time around it was Me, my father and my mother. This time the object went South East instead of North east and it was just as bright as the one I saw June 1st.
Summary: Looks like same object I reported June 1st
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Chesterville
There were no other sightings in Chesterville on or around June 20th 2013
